Leaves: Grass-like, glossy light green. V-shaped (in cross section) with finely serrated edges and a prominent mid-vein.
Flowers: A cluster of reddish or purplish brown spikelets which are on 3-9 flower stems.
FruitSeeds: Black brown, olive or grey. Oval-shaped with a beaked end.
DistinguishingFeatures: Similar to Yellow nutgrass (*Cyperus esculentus*) but has purplish rather than yellowish flowers.
